name: excess
description: Excess brings big data to the client side. It's push all the way down! Excess is a dataflow programming inspired client/server tool with a twist: it implements a unique game changing push solution, all the way from the database down to the client and back to the database. As a result, data changes  are pushed to the clients in realtime, according to filters and authorizations, enabling fully reactive fast UIs.
author: ConnectedSets
